title: Add UPI QR Code and Bank Details to Donation Section

requirements.text: Update the DonationSection component to include a UPI payment panel displaying: (1) a UPI QR code image (generated asset) with 'Scan & Pay' heading, (2) the UPI ID '76800701@ubin' as copyable text with a copy-to-clipboard button, (3) a note listing supported apps: Paytm, Google Pay, PhonePe, and any UPI app. Style this panel consistently with the existing maroon/gold palette.
acceptanceCriteria: DonationSection shows a UPI QR code image for UPI ID 76800701@ubin
UPI ID '76800701@ubin' is displayed as copyable text with a copy icon button
Clicking copy button copies the UPI ID to clipboard and shows a toast confirmation
Supported UPI apps (Paytm, Google Pay, PhonePe) are listed beneath the QR code
Panel uses the existing maroon (#632626) and gold (#dacc96) color tokens

requirements.text: Add a Bank Details card to the DonationSection component displaying the following information with individual copy-to-clipboard buttons for each field: Account Name: Gausiya Ashrafiya Foundation, Account No.: 353901010037412, IFSC Code: UBIN0535397 (Union Bank of India). Include a bank icon in the card header. Style consistently with the maroon/gold palette.
acceptanceCriteria: Bank Details card is visible in the DonationSection below or alongside the UPI panel
Account Name 'Gausiya Ashrafiya Foundation' is displayed with a copy button
Account Number '353901010037412' is displayed with a copy button
IFSC Code 'UBIN0535397' is displayed with a copy button
Each copy button copies the respective value to clipboard and shows a toast
Card header includes a bank/building icon and 'Bank Details' label
Card uses the maroon/gold color palette consistent with the rest of the app

requirements.text: Add a UPI QR code image asset to the Donation Section. The image should be a clean, scannable QR code graphic for UPI ID 76800701@ubin, displayed inside a white rounded card with 'SCAN & PAY' heading and the BHIM UPI branding label beneath it.
acceptanceCriteria: A QR code image is rendered in the UPI payment panel of DonationSection
The QR code card has a white background with rounded corners
'SCAN & PAY' heading appears above the QR code
UPI ID text '76800701@ubin' appears below the QR code image
BHIM UPI branding label is shown beneath the UPI ID

constraints: IFSC Code must be exactly: UBIN0535397
Account Name must be exactly: Gausiya Ashrafiya Foundation
Do not modify immutable frontend paths (hooks, main.tsx, ui components)
All styling must use the existing maroon/gold/tan color palette tokens
nonGoals: No actual payment gateway integration (Stripe, Razorpay, etc.)
No backend changes required for UPI/bank details display
No changes to the existing donation form fields (name, amount, message)

required: UPI QR code graphic encoding UPI ID 76800701@ubin, white rounded card background, 'SCAN & PAY' bold heading at top, BHIM UPI logo at bottom, clean minimalist style (upi-qr-code.dim_400x500.png)
